solution_line_template: If Tom could triple his reading speed, he could read {pages_per_hour} * {speed_factor} = <<{pages_per_hour}*{speed_factor}={pages_per_hour_tripled}>>{pages_per_hour_tripled} pages of a book in one hour.
Therefore, during two hours he could read {pages_per_hour_tripled} * {hours} = <<{pages_per_hour_tripled}*{hours}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages.
